pullRequest.title: Print 'ItemChannelLink' configuration in output of console commands
pullRequest.bodyText:
Print ItemChannelLink configuration in output of console commands
Renamed subcommands to link / unlink

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp github@christophweitkamp.de

commit.message:
Print ItemChannelLink configuration in output of console commands

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp <github@christophweitkamp.de>

nodes.bodyText: addChannelLink comes from a time when there were also ThingLinks. Since they do not exist anymore, I wonder if we shouldn't rather simplify the command to be simply link and unlink again, just as the help text says. Wdyt?

commit.message:
Renamed subcommands to link/unlink

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp <github@christophweitkamp.de>
